job_post_list.title: Business Operations Solution Associate, Monetization Strategy & Operations
job_post_list.description:
TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok's global headquarters are in Los Angeles and Singapore, and its offices include New York, London, Dublin, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo.

Why Join Us
Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible.
Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day.
To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always.
At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve.
Join us.

The high-performing Global Monetization Strategy & Operations (MSO) organization is essential to enabling TikTok's advertising business growth. We partner with business leaders in strategy setting, revenue planning, sales & client incentive policy-making, driving operational effectiveness in tooling and sales processes, and ensuring productive and fruitful partnerships cross-functionally across internal teams.

The high performing Global Monetization Strategy & Operations (MSO) organization is essential to enabling TikTok's advertising business growth. We partner with business leaders in strategy setting, revenue planning, sales & client incentive policy making, driving operational effectiveness in tooling and sales processes, and ensuring productive and fruitful partnerships cross-functionally across internal teams.

What You Will Do:
- Support the SMB North America and Latin America business through efficient & future proof operations, by translating business priorities into operational levers.
- Apply critical problem solving skills to identify issues in business processes & systems, propose solutions and drive change. Partner with global/cross-regional MSO team members or work independently on these projects.
- Help the sales team understand how to navigate a complex CRM system and handle day-to-day escalations and troubleshooting of system operation issues. Develop subject matter expertise to support sales requests & approvals with speed & accuracy.
- Develop operational metrics and reporting to unlock insights and analyze operational success and pain points.
- Own communication and maintain cross-functional relationships (with sales, product, finance, legal etc) in order to bridge any process and system gaps.
- Leverage tools & systems to scale impact. Drive adoption through training, documentation & automated solutions. 
- Provide guidance and enforce company policies and processes.
job_post_list.requirement:
Minimum Qualifications:
- 2+ years of experience working in a fast-paced environment; experience in digital advertising is a plus but not a must
- Bachelor degree is a minimum, preferably in a quantitative field.
- Proven record of challenging the status quo, intellectual curiosity, and a desire to consistently improve oneself.
- Strong communication, interpersonal, and presentation skills and a "can do" attitude. 
- Proficiency in Microsoft Office and Google products (specifically Excel and Google Sheets). 
- Base location: New York, Austin, San Jose

Preferred Qualifications:
- Ability and appetite to learn quickly and meet tight deadlines without sacrificing output quality. 
- Ability to evaluate problems from multiple perspectives and apply critical thinking skills. 
- Familiarity with major sales CRM platforms (i.e. SalesForce, Insightly, Boostr, etc.), Order Management Systems (i.e. Operative, FatTail, Prisma, etc.) and Ads Platforms (i.e. Google Ads Manager, Facebook, Snapchat, etc.) is a plus


TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too. 

TikTok is committed to providing reasonable accommodations in our recruitment processes for candidates with disabilities, pregnancy, sincerely held religious beliefs or other reasons protected by applicable laws. If you need assistance or a reasonable accommodation, please reach out to us at https://shorturl.at/cdpT2

job_post_list.title: TikTok LIVE Regional Operations Intern - TikTok LIVE - London
job_post_list.description:
About TikTok
TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok's global headquarters are in Los Angeles and Singapore, and its offices include New York, London, Dublin, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo. 

Why Join Us
Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our products are built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make our innovations possible.  Together, we inspire creativity and enrich life - a mission we aim towards achieving every day.  To us, every challenge, no matter how ambiguous, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always.  At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact-for ourselves, our company, and the users we serve. Join us.
The LIVE Operations team is dedicated to optimising all aspects of TikTok LIVE including content strategy, monetisation, gifting, features, creator education and campaigns.

Our mission is to drive growth, improve operational efficiency and foster positive experiences for creators and agencies alike, resulting in a fun and safe space for all our LIVE users.

As part of this, we're currently looking for an Operations Intern who will work closely with the TikTok LIVE UK team based in London.

Responsibilities
- Daily Operations: Assist in resolving various issues encountered by creators during the LIVE process by addressing day-to-day challenges including trust and safety concerns, operational hurdles and technical issues
- Training and Education: Assist in developing and/or localising educational materials for creators, ensuring they are well-versed in operational guidelines, trust and safety policies and platform features
- Campaign Operations: Support in planning, localising and executing campaigns to help deliver a seamless experience for creators, as well as summarising and analysing campaign results to identify future improvements
- Operational Processes: Deep-dive operational challenges faced by Creator Managers in their daily workflows and help to implement improvements in order to increase teamâ€™s overall operational efficiency
job_post_list.requirement:
Minimum Qualifications
- Currently pursuing a Bachelor's or Master's degree and available to start immediately or by January 2025 at the latest
- Able to start as soon as possible for internship lasting at least 3 months (6 months is preferred)
- Fluent English in addition to strong communication and writing skills

Preferred Qualifications
- Strong analytic background with extensive experience of using data to inform decision-making
- Experience of live-streaming either as a creator or a consumer, good understanding of broader media landscape
- Ability to work largely autonomously in a fast-paced and dynamic environment
- Mandarin language skills are a bonus to work with Chinese creators

TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

job_post_list.title: Global Privacy Regulatory Advisory Counsel, Minors
job_post_list.description:
About TikTok
TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok's global headquarters are in Los Angeles and Singapore, and its offices include New York, London, Dublin, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo.

Why Join Us
Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our products are built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make our innovations possible. Together, we inspire creativity and enrich life - a mission we aim towards achieving every day. To us, every challenge, no matter how ambiguous, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always. At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact-for ourselves, our company, and the users we serve. Join us.

About the Team
The Global Privacy & Regulatory Affairs team handles and oversees legal privacy and regulatory matters pertaining to TikTok's global operations. The team works cross-functionally with multiple stakeholders in the US and around the world to tackle some of the most complex, interesting, and cutting edge issues in privacy and security. We are looking for highly motivated, experienced, and bright legal professionals to join our exciting team.

Responsibilities
- Monitor emerging global privacy and social media laws relating to minor data protection, minor safety and age assurance issues, and advise on compliance strategies.
- Counsel on minor data protection, minor safety and age assurance issues with cross-function stakeholders related to age assurance and minor protection processes and procedures, the launch of new and updated consumer products, features and services, and engagements with stakeholders on such issues. 
- Identify business and product requirements resulting from engagements with privacy regulators and other stakeholders, and provide guidance and thought leadership on implementation of privacy controls.
- Collaborate with cross-functional and cross-regional stakeholders on privacy program and policy development, compliance monitoring, and communication strategies related to minor protection and safety.
job_post_list.requirement:
Minimum Qualifications:
- J.D. degree from ABA accredited law school (or foreign equivalent) with membership in good standing in a US state bar.  
- Experience working in an in-house legal department of a tech company or in a reputable law firm with substantial experience in tech, media and telecomm work.  
- Experience and interest in minor privacy and safety legal issues, such as COPPA and Age Appropriate Design Code compliance.   
- Enjoys being challenged, is adaptable and able to manage multiple tasks in a dynamic environment.   Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to convey complex legal concepts to non-legal stakeholders.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience and interest in minor privacy and safety legal issues, such as COPPA and Age Appropriate Design Code compliance.
- Enjoys being challenged, is adaptable and able to manage multiple tasks in a dynamic environment.

TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

TikTok is committed to providing reasonable accommodations in our recruitment processes for candidates with disabilities, pregnancy, sincerely held religious beliefs or other reasons protected by applicable laws. If you need assistance or a reasonable accommodation, please reach out to us at https://shorturl.at/cdpT2

job_post_list.title: Shop | Tokopedia - Short Tail (Non Brand) Account Management Intern, Woman's Wear Fashion(Indonesia) - 2025 Start
job_post_list.description:
TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok's global headquarters are in Los Angeles and Singapore, and its offices include New York, London, Dublin, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo. 

Why Join Us
Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible. 
Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day. 
To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always. 
At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve. 
Join us.

In particular, the e-commerce industry has seen tremendous growth in recent years and has become a hotly contested space amongst leading Internet companies, and its future growth cannot be underestimated. With millions of loyal users globally, we believe TikTok is an ideal platform to deliver a brand new and better e-commerce experience to our users.

As a project intern, you will have the opportunity to engage in impactful short-term projects that provide you with a glimpse of professional real-world experience. You will gain practical skills through on-the-job learning in a fast-paced work environment and develop a deeper understanding of your career interests.

Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis - we encourage you to apply early. Successful candidates must be able to commit to at least 3 months long internship period.

Responsibilities
- Manage account of sellers as backup for team members
- Conduct analysis for womenswear and the overall fashion industries
- Assist account managers with adhoc tasks in resolving seller issues
- Work and to be mentored closely with category managers and account managers
job_post_list.requirement:
Minimum Qualifications
- Major in business/economics/engineering
- At least on 3rd-4th year of university
- Able to come to the office at least 3-4days/week
- Good communication skill and comfortable with data. Able to use Microsoft Excel and Power Point (or similar applications)

Preferred Qualifications
- Having previous experience as intern in other e-commerce platform

TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

By submitting an application for this role, you accept and agree to our global applicant privacy policy, which may be accessed here: https://careers.tiktok.com/legal/privacy.
If you have any questions, please reach out to us at apac-earlycareers@tiktok.com
